readers.type: Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Content.DictionaryReader`2[[System.String, mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089],[System.String, mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089]]

content.WipedMemory: You're the new farmer, aren't you?#$e#You seem... no. I'm sure we've never met.
content.AbigailInMineFirst: Hey, @. Surprised? ...I finally found the courage to come down here.#$b#I felt scared at first, but I pushed through.#$b#I feel much more confident now. This is actually really fun!$h
content.AbigailInMine0: Hey! I made it pretty far, didn't I?$h
content.AbigailInMine1: Eep!$7#$b#Hahah! You scared me! I didn't expect to see another person down here!$h#$e#Sorry, I'm all sweaty from excitement...
content.AbigailInMine2: Hi @! I made it here without fighting any monsters...
content.AbigailInMine3: Hey! It's a relief to see you down here...$h#$e#Um... don't tell my Dad I'm here, okay?$9
content.AbigailInMine4: Hey! Exploring the mines on a rainy day, huh? Me too!$h
content.Henchman1: Gweee-ah!! Human!#$b#...You want to pass? I'm sorry, this is private property.$s
content.Henchman2: I'm sorry, but I can't let you pass... I'd lose my job.
content.Henchman3: You're offering this to me? Hmm... no thanks.$s
content.Henchman4: Mmmm... that looks fresh, but no thanks... why don't you have it?
content.KrobusDarkTalisman: What's that... you're looking for a dark talisman?#$b#...Hmmm. Now that you mention it, I did have one in my possession not too long ago.#$b#Unfortunately, I dropped it while exploring that tunnel in the far corner.#$b#Things started heating up in there, so I left in a hurry and sealed the entrance.#$b#You seem pretty sturdy, though... So I'll open it back up for you. Just be careful, okay?
content.Divorced_bouquet: This... Are you trying to hurt me even more?$s
